EmailTemplate.subject: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, join us for a look at upcoming updates to BigCommerce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We’re excited to invite you to our April BigCommerce Town Hall. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Join us for the May BigCommerce Town Hall <[[http://grow.bigcommerce.com/05-2016-Town-Hall-Registration-Page.html]]>. During this month's conversation, BigCommerce CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team will give you a detailed look at:
- Stencil theme updates for merchants
- BigCommerce's new channel manager
- Optimized single page checkout advance preview - Plus more!
We'll hold a live Q&A session during the Town Hall, but you can also submit questions in advance by logging in and commenting in our Community <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/group/0F913000000HLTBCA4?t=1461271876897]]>. BigCommerce Town Hall <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/1056162656249718786]]> When: April 28, 2015 from 2-3pm CT What: A discussion of BigCommerce news and a look at upcoming product enhancements, followed by live Q&A with CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team. Presenters: CEO Brent Bellm and the Product Team
Reserve your spot <[[https://attendee.gotowebinar.com/register/1056162656249718786]]> We’ll hold a live Q&A session during the Town Hall, but you can also submit questions in advance by commenting in our community discussion <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/group/0F913000000HLTBCA4?t=1461271876897]]>.
If you’re unable to join us, don’t worry — we’ll record each Town Hall and post the video in the Community <[[https://forum.bigcommerce.com/s/article/BigCommerce-Town-Halls?t=1461271876897]]> and Partner Portal. Hope to see you there, The BigCommerce Team
